text: Beloved late actor Paul Walker had a smile that would light up a room, undeniable charisma, and a genuine warmth that his friends and family continue to celebrate through an emotional, new TV documentary called “ I Am Paul Walker. ” In it there is never - before - seen footage of Walker from when he was an adorable toddler to an impressionable teen, and a handsome adult - turned - mega movie star. Walker helped catapult the “ The Fast & Furious ” franchise and had a genuine love of cars and speed, and tragically and ironically it was that passion that led to his death. Back in 2013, Walker died in a car crash near Los Angeles at the young age of 40. Walker is survived by his parents Paul Walker Sr. and Cheryl Walker, brothers Cody Walker and Caleb
